Windows 11预览版更新添加了新的电源模式选项https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/windows-11-preview-update-adds-new-power-mode-options/ Sun, 18 Aug 2024 15:06:32 -0400玛雅克·帕尔玛MicrosoftSoftware https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/microsoft/windows-11-preview-update-adds-new-power-mode-options/ Windows 11 Build 27686 has a few noteworthy improvements, such as 2TB support for FAT32 storage. It also improves Windows Sandbox and offers greater control over HDR settings, but there's an undocumented change - the ability to set power mode for two power states. [...]
